attributes.action: make all foriegn trucks pay to use our roads and pay any motoring offence fines eg speeding and conjestion/emissions charges before leaving the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: make foriegn trucks pay to use our roads. also make them pay any motoring offences eg speeding before leaving uk.also make them pay the emission charge and conjestion charges  surley this can be done through number plate recognition system by checking them at the port of departure and holding them until all fines/charges are paid we have to pay why shouldn't they?
